short_summary: Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for Elder services for Indigenous offenders
description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a pre-identified supplier to provide Elder services for Indigenous offenders. The Elder must provide spiritual and cultural services, including counseling, guidance, and ceremonial services. The contract is for a period of seven (7) months, from August 29, 2022 to March 31, 2023, with an option to extend for three (3) additional one-year periods. The estimated value of the contract is $160,200.00 (GST/HST extra).
